title: 13.11.13 / updated test
content: Sass is a CSS pre-processor. It expands the CSS Language with powerful features which allows to write a more concise and maintainable code than CSS.

title: 25.11.13 / re-test update
content: PhoneGap is an open source framework to create mobile apps from any web apps using standardized web APIs: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: 20.11.13 / B
content: Grunt is a javaScript task runner. After configuration, Grunt handles automation of repetitive tasks like minification, compilation, unit testing, linting.

title: 22.11.13 / C
content: Bower is a package manager for the web. It offers a generic, unopinionated solution to the front-end package management.

title: 24.11.13 / testo
content: Git is a version control software made to track the evolutions of a collaborative programming project. The default Git application has no graphical interface. It relies on the Terminal.
